item.title: vim vs emacs - text mining to settle the editor war
item.description: This project is not finished and will be developed over time. 0. Why Iâ€™m making this project I want to try out new programming and statistical tools that I read or heard about (tidytext, nlp, laser) on a subject that I find interesting (text editors). If somebody asks me if vim is a good choice for a text editor, I want to have objective arguments to prove my statement.
